Microservices Architecture

Comprehensive guides on microservices architecture patterns, distributed systems, and modern cloud-native development.

Topics

  1. Microservices Fundamentals - Core concepts, architecture patterns, and design principles
  2. Service Discovery - Client-side and server-side discovery patterns, service registries
  3. API Gateway - Entry points, routing, authentication, and aggregation patterns
  4. Event-Driven Architecture - Event sourcing, CQRS, message brokers, and async communication
  5. Service Mesh - Istio, Linkerd, traffic management, and observability
  6. Distributed Tracing - OpenTelemetry, Jaeger, Zipkin, and correlation IDs
  7. Circuit Breaker Pattern - Resilience patterns, fault tolerance, and failover strategies
  8. Inter-Service Communication - REST, gRPC, GraphQL, and messaging patterns
  9. Microservices Deployment - Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD, and blue-green deployments
  10. Configuration Management - Centralized config, feature flags, and secrets management
  11. Microservices Testing - Unit, integration, contract, and end-to-end testing strategies
  12. API Versioning Strategies - URL, header, and content negotiation versioning
